faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I get international mail forwarding?
items.answer: Yes. Our mail management solutions include international shipping for all letters, packages, and courier deliveries.

items.question: How secure is my mail with One Nexuz?
items.answer: We receive, sort, and organise all your mail in a secure facility, logged with time stamps, and handled only by authorised staff.

items.question: What happens if I miss a delivery or urgent government mail?
items.answer: You won’t! With real-time alerts for every incoming item, we keep you up-to-date with each delivery, so you can efficiently re-route any vital documents.

items.question: Can I use this mailing address for my company's trade license?
items.answer: Yes, we use a fully compliant mailing address so you can utilise it for DED registrations, free zone applications, and official documents.

items.question: Can I manage my mail remotely if I’m traveling?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can instruct us to scan, hold, forward, or discard mail remotely, as well as collect essential documents when you’re available.
